about_the_game:
Gunforged is a goofy fantasy roguelite shooter where you create broken builds every run. Enter the arena, lay waste to waves of enemies, eradicate bosses, and extract with gold. Forge your guns with randomized gun parts, collect passive abilities, and embed gun-changing runes into your guns to create the ultimate build.

Forge your guns

Keep increasing the power of your guns by acquiring gun parts. Embed runes with powerful abilities into your guns to create wild and overpowered combinations.

Collect passive abilities

Choose between dozens of passive abilities after each wave. Call down lightning storms, spawn "Blood Brothers", use your stamina as health, and more with these game-changing passive abilities. Create the perfect build by making the right choices.

Create wild builds & fight challenging enemies

Become overpowered. Shoot bananas. Forge a cow-gun. Get private security. Become a glass cannon. Become the opposite of a glass cannon (obsidian paperweight?).

Slay waves of challenging enemies. Encounter and destroy 6 unique bosses. Fight through each of the 3 arenas to encounter more difficult and unique enemies.

Lock in your progression

Use the gold you extract from each run to purchase permanent upgrades. Gain the Loot Goblin as a permanent companion. Increase your max health. Enable more customizability. And more!
